ERIA works with the ASEAN Chair in producing research projects that serve the Chair&#039;s objectives in the one-year chairmanship period, while working to secure the long term goal of deepening regional integration.&nbsp;</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:30:"/uploads/topics/asean-flag.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"200";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:74:"ASEAN, research, economic integration, nation building, community building";s:16:"meta_description";s:158:"ERIA works with ASEAN Chair on research projects that serve the Chair's objectives in the one-year period, while aiming towards deepening regional integration";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2017-11-29 17:30:40";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:2;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"213";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:18:"call-for-proposals";s:13:"category_name";s:18:"Call for Proposals";s:11:"description";s:211:"<p>ERIA invites the submission of research proposals to join its research projects across sectors. Therefore, ERIA examines the experience of those countries in an effort to provide recommendations to strengthen disaster relief and disaster management, as well as to ensure food security in the aftermath of disasters.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:38:"/uploads/topics/disaster_224916541.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"400";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:93:"disaster relief, disaster management, ring of fire, flood, volcano, earthquake, food security";s:16:"meta_description";s:141:"ERIA examines the experience of ASEAN countries in an effort to provide recommendations to strengthen disaster relief and disaster management";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2017-12-06 12:50:37";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"9";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:8;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"14";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:36:"education-training-and-human-capital";s:13:"category_name";s:38:"Education, Training, and Human Capital";s:11:"description";s:439:"<p>Education is one of the key components of development, along with training, that builds human capital&mdash;especially with their spillover effects. ERIA examines the effect of education on capacity building in various ways, such as development capacity, innovation capability, and managerial efficiency. ERIA&rsquo;s studies also delve into the effects of higher education, learning centres, and technology transfers, among others.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:39:"/uploads/topics/education_245320060.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"500";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:135:"education, development capacity, innovation capability, managerial efficiency, higher education, learning centres, technology transfers";s:16:"meta_description";s:63:"ERIA studies education and its spillover effects on development";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-15 09:39:49";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:9;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"15";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:6:"energy";s:13:"category_name";s:6:"Energy";s:11:"description";s:1014:"<p>According to ERIA&rsquo;s research, the amount of energy consumption in this region will practically double in 2040. Therefore, conventional energy may still be used by most ASEAN and East Asian countries to satisfy the growing energy demand, with efforts to reduce the environmental impact and to gradually increase the use of renewable energy. ERIA produces annual research on&nbsp;energy outlook and energy saving potential in East Asia to look at the balance of energy best-mix based on each country&rsquo;s policy and targets, as well as to predict the pattern of future energy consumption.</p><p>Some of ERIA&#039;s studies on renewable and clean energy includes projects on biomass energy utilisation, nuclear energy safety and efficiency, energy saving, energy security, eco town, low carbon emission, and power generation. Furthermore, ERIA have also contribute suggestions on energy policy, energy market integration, emission regulation, as well as country specific energy consumption statistics.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:36:"/uploads/topics/energy_112485596.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"600";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:84:"conventional energy, renewable energy, energy outlook, energy mix, energy statistics";s:16:"meta_description";s:84:"ERIA studies conventional and renewable energy, energy outlook and energy statistics";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-01-29 17:19:07";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}i:10;O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:2:"16";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:30:"environment-and-climate-change";s:13:"category_name";s:30:"Environment and Climate Change";s:11:"description";s:488:"<p>Climate change is an immense global challenge. ERIA endeavours to help the environment through&nbsp;its research on renewable energy, power infrastructure, carbon footprint, biodiversity conservation, and food supply chain. In addition, ERIA conducts studies on circular economy, sustainability assessment, energy policy suggestions, sustainable development policy advices, energy market integration propositions, inclusive green growth model, new development model, and many more.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:41:"/uploads/topics/environment_392220364.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"700";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:115:"renewable energy, power infrastructure, biodiversity conservation, circular economy, green growth, carbon footprint";s:16:"meta_description";s:157:"ERIA endeavours to help the environment through research on renewable energy, power infrastructure, biodiversity conservation, circular economy, green growth";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-14 09:43:14";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-02-24 09:52:59.495407";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
